reviews.text:
Santos Cleaning Solutions truly went above and beyond for one of our new home care clients. His home needed a lot of attention, and their team stepped in with professionalism, care, and zero judgment. They transformed the space in a way that will make a real difference in his day-to-day life and allow us to provide the support he needs.

Iâ€™m genuinely grateful for their hard work and the respect they showed throughout the process. Highly recommend Santos Cleaning Solutionsâ€”they are a team you can trust.

reviews.text: This was hands down the best deep cleaning service Iâ€™ve ever received. They were able to address all my concerns and also clean the high ceiling fixtures and windows for me!  They arrived at 10am and didn't finish until 4pm, needless to say, being thorough and ensuring I was a satisfied customer was a top priority for Santos Cleaning. My home sparkled and smelled so clean for days after the service, especially my bathrooms. I was so confident in their service, I ended up taking a nap while they cleaned the whole (felt good to rest knowing everything was being taken care of with great detail). I will be booking again and I  highly recommend booking them for deep cleaning and any regularly scheduled cleaning services you may need.

reviews.text: William and Karen came by on short noticed to do our move in deep cleaning and we appreciate them so much for making sure we move into a clean, sanitized throughly dust free home. I will be setting up a once of month schedule with them from now on
reviews.original_text: William and Karen came by on short noticed to do our move in deep cleaning and we appreciate them so much for making sure we move into a clean, sanitized throughly dust free home. I will be setting up a once of month schedule with them from now on

reviews.text: Santos Cleaning was amazing in a pinch. My father passed away last Monday and I had reached out to another cleaning company which fell through twice to clean my Mom's house. I reached out to Santos Friday morning and they had Karen come out the same afternoon. She did a fantastic job. Karen was thorough and meticulous and extremely nice. They were very understanding of my situation and incredibly professional. I would hire them again and again, especially if they could come to McDonough. ðŸ™‚ Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. You shed a big light on a dark situation and I cant thank you and your team enough.
reviews.original_text: Santos Cleaning was amazing in a pinch. My father passed away last Monday and I had reached out to another cleaning company which fell through twice to clean my Mom's house. They were very understanding of my situation and incredibly professional. I would hire them again and again, especially if they could come to McDonough. ðŸ™‚ Thank you so much from the bottom of my heart. reviews.text: The service I received was very unsatisfactory. I provided cleaning supplies such as leather cleaner, glass and wood cleaners, but they didn't use them as requested. The cleaning was not thorough and I was disappointed with the results.
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Ms. Johnson, I'm truly sorry to hear that you weren't satisfied with our service. We take all feedback seriously and would like to make this right. Please contact us directly so we can address your concerns and provide a solution.

reviews.text: I was trying to book a move out clean within a weeks notice. SCS was quick to respond with a reasonable rate. All around great communication and excellent service. Will definitely book again if needed.
reviews.original_text: I was trying to book a move out clean within a weeks notice. SCS was quick to respond with a reasonable rate. All around great communication and excellent service. Will definitely book again if needed.

reviews.text: I am completely satisfied with the weekly cleaning.  They are always on time and pleasant.    If I need any particular thing cleaned in detail they make sure to follow through.  I highly recommend Santos Cleaning Solutions and think youâ€™ll be pleased!

reviews.text: Santos Cleaning Solutions is a wonderful company. Trust is a HUGE deal when allowing someone into your home. Not only do they do an amazing job EVERY time, but they are always in a good mood. We trust Santos Cleaning Solutions into our home even if we are not there.
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Peter, Thank you so much for such thoughtful words! Building trust with our clients is our top priority, and it means the world to us that you feel comfortable with our team in your home. We truly appreciate your trust!

reviews.text: Impeccable and very well-done work. Truly professional. I highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Graziele, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're thrilled that you found our work impeccable and professional. We appreciate your recommendation!

reviews.text: Excellent cleaning service! Their attention to detail is outstanding, and they deliver top-quality results every time. The team is professional, reliable, and always leaves my home spotless. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Vivian, Thank you so much for such an amazing review! We're delighted to hear about your positive experience with our attention to detail and quality service. We appreciate your trust and recommendation!

reviews.text: This was my first time hiring a cleaning service and now I regret not doing it sooner. The house is completely renovated. Great job!
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Eliane, Thank you so much for your amazing review! We're thrilled that your first experience with a cleaning service was so positive. We're honored to have transformed your home and appreciate your trust!

reviews.text: From the first message to the end of the cleaning, everything was smooth and professional. They answered all my questions and made me feel totally comfortable. Excellent communication and service!
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Lorrayne, Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're delighted that you found our communication smooth and professional from start to finish. We appreciate your trust!

reviews.text: Great service and excellent value for money. Professional team and outstanding results!

reviews.text: I love Santos Cleaning Services, they are always very professional and do a great job! I completely trust them with my home!
reviews.response_from_owner: Hi Lara, Thank you so much for your amazing review! We're thrilled that you love our services and completely trust us with your home. We truly appreciate your continued trust!
